class DirectSampler[source]

DirectSampler(protocol, simulator, err_model=None, err_probs=None) :: Sampler

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from qsam.examples import ghz3
from qsam.noise import E1, E2
from qsam.sim.stabilizer import StabilizerSimulator as CHP
from qsam.callbacks import *

e = E2

sample_range = np.logspace(-3,0,5)

err_probs = {
    "q1": 0,
    "q2": sample_range
}

sam = DirectSampler(ghz3, CHP, err_probs=err_probs, err_model=e)

sam.run(1000, callbacks=[PlotStats()])
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from ipywidgets import interact
import ipywidgets as widgets

def get_tree(i):
    print("p_phy=", list(sam.trees.keys())[i])
    return (list(sam.trees.values())[i]).draw()
interact(get_tree, i=widgets.IntSlider(min=0, max=len(sam.trees)-1, step=1, value=0));
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sam.save('./test')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sam2 = Sampler.load('./test')
sam2.run(100)
